knimeNode.name: JPython Script 2:1
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes a JPython script, taking 2 input tables and returning 1 output table.

intro.p: Executes a JPython script, taking 2 input DataTables and returning 1 output DataTable.

fullDescription.option:
The second input DataTable containing input from input port 1. Mirrors the range of use and functionality of inData0 (see help on JPython 1:1 node for more details.)
Available methods: same as for inData0.

inPort.name: Table 1 that the JPython script will operate on.

ports.inPort: Table 1 that the JPython script will operate on.

inPort.name: Table 2 that the JPython script will operate on.

ports.inPort: Table 2 that the JPython script will operate on.

outPort.name: Table containing the results of the JPython script.

ports.outPort: Table containing the results of the JPython script.
